title: Town of KTaNE
author: BananaLord
description: This is a simulation of a social deduction game called Town of Salem, where you against other people in this situation 7 others, will get to fight against each other and see who will survive and who will DIE! You must determine what each player's role is, where they are going, and what are they doing, to solve the module you will have to do submit three people's night statuses.
